Package Model

Class Session

Object
Session
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Session extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single cinema session where a movie will be played
Since:
2022-11-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cai Kaihang

    • Session

      public Session(int movieID, int totalSeats, LocalDateTime timeSlot)
      Creates a session for a specific movie in a cinema
      Parameters:
      movieID - Identifier for the movie to be shown
      totalSeats - Total number of seats
      timeSlot - Time slot allocated for movie showing
